name: lidify
description: Lidify is a self-hosted LightFM-based recommender service for media or user-content platforms. It helps generate personalized suggestions based on user behavior and historical data within privacy-controlled environments.
features: Recommendation Engine: LightFM-based suggestions, User behavior analysis, Personalized content. Generate smart recommendations.
Privacy-Controlled: Self-hosted, No external tracking, Local processing. Keep user data private.
Media Platform: Content recommendations, User preferences, Historical data. Enhance your media platform.
Machine Learning: LightFM algorithm, Collaborative filtering, Hybrid recommendations. Advanced AI-powered suggestions.
User Behavior: Interaction tracking, Preference learning, Pattern recognition. Understand user interests.
Content Analysis: Item features, Metadata processing, Similarity matching. Intelligent content understanding.
API Integration: RESTful endpoints, Easy integration, Custom implementations. Connect to any platform.
Performance Optimization: Fast inference, Scalable architecture, Efficient processing. Handle large catalogs.
